text: Li Jisheng (1917 â€“ 30 December 2022) was a Chinese writer, translator, editor and publisher. He worked at the . He was known as editor and reviewer of . His brother was writer Ba Jin. Li Jisheng died in Shanghai on 30 December 2022, at the age of 105. ==References== Category:21st-century Chinese writers Category:Chinese translators Category:Chinese editors Category:Chinese publishers Category:1917 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chinese centenarians Category:20th-century Chinese writers Category:21st-century Chinese people
